metadata.title: CVE-2016-7970 on Ubuntu 16.04 FIPS Compliant (xenial) - medium
metadata.description: Buffer overflow in the calc_coeff function in libass/ass_blur.c in libassbefore 0.13.4 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service viaunspecified vectors.

criterions.comment: libass: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support, was needed').
